name: REST Countries API
description: REST Countries API is a full-stack app to browse, search, and filter country details with a modern UI and dark mode support.

name: Personal Finance Tracker
description: A GUI based project using Python and Tkinter

name: Star Wars Character Info
description: A project using HTML, CSS and Javascript to display random Star Wars characters

name: Currency Converter
description: A currency converter built with HTML, CSS and Javascript

name: AI Travel Planner
description: The AI Travel Planner is a full-stack app offering AI-driven travel recommendations. Users can search destinations, view suggestions, and save trips with a responsive React frontend and a secure Node.js/Express backend.

name: Sweet Tooth
description: I developed Sweet Tooth, a responsive e-commerce web app with React, Node.js, and PostgreSQL, featuring user authentication, admin dashboard, and real-time cart functionality.

name: Planet fact site
description: This is a responsive Planets Fact Site built with React and Node.js. It provides detailed planet information through interactive tabs and dynamic navigation. The app fetches data from an API and features a visually appealing, mobile-friendly design.

name: IP Address Tracker
description: The IP Address Tracker is a web app that lets users search for IP addresses or domains to view location, timezone, and ISP details on an interactive map. Built with React, Node.js, and Leaflet.js, it provides a responsive and user-friendly experience.

name: Multi-Step Form Site
description: A Multi-Step Form Application built with React, Express, and PostgreSQL, featuring dynamic steps, responsive design, and seamless data saving to localStorage and a database. Ideal for onboarding or subscription workflows.
